title: Goat cheese and herb roll
ingredients: ['280g soft goat cheese', '1 small garlic clove, finely chopped', '2 to 3 tablespoons finely chopped rosemary', '2 to 3 tablespoons finely chopped parsley', '2 to 3 tablespoons finely chopped chives', '1 tablespoon finely chopped mint', 'grated zest of 1/2 an orange', 'salt and pepper to taste']
